alert.note: Alert for Lower Terrebonne; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Terrebonne Parish through 200 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Amelia, or 10 miles west of Houma, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dulac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
